entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
